alert.note: Alert for North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:21PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Walton County through 700 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Laurel Hill, or near Florala, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Paxton, Gordon, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Fox Hill, Gaskin, Sand Hill, Lakewood, Flowersville, New Harmony, Mossy Head and Caney Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
